content.title: Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan - Internship Program
content.details: To allow/engage ‘Students’ enrolled/pursuing undergraduate, graduate, or postgraduate degree programs and 'Young Research Scholars' enrolled/pursuing Doctoral (Ph.D.) or post-doctoral degrees in given academic disciplines from recognized/reputed University(s)/Institution(s) within India or abroad for short-term (maximum of 3 months only) engagement of 'Selected Candidates' as 'Interns' in various Units, Cells, and Programmes of different Divisions of MoPR under the Revamped RGSA Scheme for the period of FY 2022-23 to 2025-26.
benefits: Logistic and Stipend Support of ₹ 7000/- per month
eligibility: Students enrolled/pursuing Undergraduate / Graduate/ Postgraduate degree programs
Research Scholars enrolled/pursuing Doctoral (Ph.D.)/Post-Doctoral degree in a recognized/reputed University(s)/Institution(s)
exclusions: The period of the internship shall be at least four (4) weeks but not exceeding three (3) months.
Interns not completing the requisite period will not be issued any certificates.
content.application_process: Online application process through the official website of MoPR.
documents_required: Letter from Supervisor/ Head of Department/ or principal indicating their status in the institution
No Objection Certificate (NOC) for allowing their student to undergo an Internship program

faqs.question: What is the purpose of internship with MoPR?
faqs.answer: To engage 'Students' and 'Research Scholars' for tapping academic talents, knowledge, skills, and techniques to be best utilized and associated with the MoPR's Policy and Action Research work for mutual benefits.

faqs.question: What is the Period of Internship?
faqs.answer: The Internship Program shall be available throughout the year, based on the requirements of MoPR.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria of the internship scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicants pursuing Graduation/Post Graduation/Research courses from any recognized University/Institution within India or abroad are eligible to apply for the internship.

faqs.question: Is the Internship program part of Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 'Internship Program' is part of the Framework for Implementation of Centrally Sponsored Scheme (CSS) of Revamped Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan (RGSA) (2022–23 to 2025-26) of the Ministry of Panchayati Raj (MoPR), Government of India.

faqs.question: Will I get the Experience Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, a certificate will be issued after successful completion of the Internship period.
